name: "Werner Aluminum Work Platform"
description: With a 225 lb. load capacity, the Werner Aluminum Work Platform allows you to work comfortably along walls and windows, making it ideal for painting and wall papering applications. The lightweight design is easy to carry and set up, folding conveniently for storage. Designed for comfort and stability, the platform measures 39-1/2 in. x 12 in. and has a standing level of 20 in., creating a sturdy work space for a variety of jobs.Aluminum construction is lightweight yet durable225 lb. load capacity ideal for light household applicationsNon-marring feet won't mark the floorFoldable design is easy to store and carryPlatform size: 39-1/2 in. x 12 in. with standing level of 20 in.

attributes.value: 39-1/2 in. x 12 in. with standing level of 20 in.
